summary: Vlad Tepes, otherwise known as Vlad the Impaler and Dracula, fights the Ottoman Turks on the battlefield and the Hungarian Boyars in his court.
cast: Stefan Sileanu|Ernest Maftei|Emanoil Petrut|Teofil Vâlcu|Alexandru Repan|Constantin Codrescu|George Constantin|Constantin Barbulescu|Ion Marinescu|Silviu Stanculescu|Vasile Cosma|Petre Simionescu|György Kovács|Mihai Paladescu|Petrica Gheorghiu|Andrei Bursaci|Nicolae Mavrodin|András Csiky|Mircea Cosma|Ion Roxin|Dan Sandulescu|Eugeniu Ungureanu|Virgil Popovici|Zoltán Vadász|Nae Mazilu|Mircea Anghelescu|Ion Jugureanu|Iulian Necsulescu|Emil Coseriu|Constantin Dinulescu|Sorin Lepa|Mircea Basta|Vasile Constantinescu|Zephi Alsec|Stefan Radoff|Ferenc Fábián|Costache Diamandi|Emil Liptac|Sandu Simionica|Vasile Florescu|Papil Panduru|Stefan Velniciuc|István Török|Sigismund Ziegfrid|Dan Nasta|Dinu Gherasim|László Miske|Alexandru Demetriad|Romulus Barbulescu|Dan Dobre|Ion Colan|Mihai Badiu|Vlad Radescu|Lupu Ionel|Radu Dunareanu|Misu Dragoi|Florin Stroe|Simion Negrila|Ion C. title: Vlad Tepes
